item.title: Blackmesa.7z Partial Download
item.dc:creator: sixcentgeorge
item.description:
use the 99% file with torrent , as firetime said : it checks the hash values as it downloads.
so start download and stop when the file is written to the hd , then replace it with the 99% and recheck the file with torrent so it will keep the good part of the file and you will not redownload all

item.title: Blackmesa.7z Partial Download
item.dc:creator: FireTime
item.description:
The download is now bunk. I’m guessing you were using google chrome ( from the .partial extension ) and it doesn’t have a resume feature. Try again using a download manage or if at all possible use the torrent. The torrent has thousands of seeds now and can never be corrupted as it checks the hash values as it downloads.
